title: Tori Spelling reveals she had sex with '90210' co-stars
text:
Tori Spelling reveals she had sex with '90210' co-stars 
Postmedia Network Thursday, October 01, 2015 12:29 PM MDT | Updated: Jennie Garth, Tori Spelling's new show a hit 
Why would anyone hook themselves up to a lie detector to be asked salacious questions about their sex life on camera? 
Well, if you're Tori Spelling, it's all part of the publicity machine for Lifetime's "The Unauthorized Beverly Hills 90210 Story," which airs right before the former "90210" actress spills a bunch of secrets from her time on the set. 
In a clip from "Tori Spelling: Celebrity Lie Detector," which airs Oct. 3 at 10 pm. EST, Spelling is asked if she ever had sex with anyone in the cast. 
After some prying, Spelling reveals she had an intimate relationship with Brian Austin Green, who played David Silver. 
"I was a young girl, Brian [Austin Green] and I were the youngest, we were 16 and I remember the first time I shook his hand, I had that ... I fancied him." 
The interviewer also got her to admit she had sex with another cast member, which she did not name in the clip.
